description: This course is composed of five parts: 1. An Overview of Chinese Law 2. Chinese Partnership Law 3. Foreign Investment Enterprise Law 4. Chinese Corporation Law 5. Chinese Securities Law
preclusion:

LL4089V/LL5089V/LL6089V Chinese Corporate & Securities Law

title: Chinese Business Law
